document_data.name: Dusk's Dark Desires
document_data.mainbody:
'''''A Tour of Tempest''''' was an [[Umberlant]] [[book]] that discussed the [[divine]] [[tempest domain]], written by and published sometime in or before the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Tell you what, I really enjoyed our book this month. Dusk's Dark Desires - highly recommend it.''|[[Caerdwyn]]}}
document_data.Content: ''Dusk's Dark Desires'' was a series of intrigue and lewd romance chapbooks. One of the later novels in the series was noticeably more smutty than its prequels with the blood and sex being, arguably the books' best parts. Some also praised the book's fine intrigue and character work of Bedford, a beautifully-written [[werecow]], as well as Dusk, the novels' protagonist.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the [[Book Brigade]], a book club in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]], met to discuss several books in the series.
